A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: We were ready at the trough to eat almost anything Star Wars\, and the director and writers fed us this indigestible stew. The story and plot seemed the be written by a 7 year old kid that mixed every good and bad ideas into the story whether it made sense or not. I can’t believed I almost stood in line at midnight just to see this junk. Star Wars cartoons has better character development and plots.
